notes: Two-level clinical workflow taxonomy for labeling medical ML papers. L1 is a broad stage, L2 is a finer sub-stage. Papers may have multiple labels.

Screening.desc: Population screening, early detection, triage-like screening in non-clinical settings

Diagnosis.desc: Clinical diagnosis and differential diagnosis; supporting clinician decision-making

Triage.desc: Prioritization and routing: urgency, referral, escalation, resource allocation

Treatment.desc: Treatment selection, planning, personalization, dosing, and therapy optimization

Monitoring.desc: Continuous monitoring, follow-up, ICU/ward monitoring, wearable sensing

Prognosis.desc: Outcome prediction: survival, complications, readmission, progression

Rehabilitation.desc: Rehab planning, recovery tracking, functional outcome prediction

Workflow.desc: Clinical operations: documentation, scheduling, coding, reporting, quality improvement

DrugDiscovery.desc: Drug discovery, molecule generation, target identification; pre-clinical

ImagingPipeline.desc: Imaging pipeline stage: acquisition, reconstruction, detection, segmentation, reporting

DataInfra.desc: Data standardization, privacy, evaluation, benchmarking, foundation models for medical data
